content: **about twinkle** twinkle the strawberry jerboa lives in a hot cosmic desert where a special kind of strawberry flourishes these mysterious fruit have a hidden secret though because concealed inside each one is a perfectly camouflaged little creature when it s safe the strawberries pop open exploding explode in a puff of fur and on closer inspection you ll find these fur balls are in fact little jumping jerboas **about the pattern** twinkle has been designed in collaboration with ** scheepjes yarn 1 ** as an entry-level pattern to introduce you to crocheting with fur yarn in an easy project this pattern is the second addition to the ** smuggle-tuck pets 2 ** collection and it s part of ** projectarian s year of fur 3 ** event she is a reversible amigurumi that flips inside out to become a strawberry she can also be made as a standalone stuffed plushie and the pattern describes how twinkle s design uses very simple shaping over all so you can focus more on your crocheting technique than on trying to understand the pattern special shaping is used to make the bend in twinkle s neck however before you make this bend with fur yarn you ll learn the shaping technique by first making the back legs with the same bend using plain yarn you ll be shown how to use markers to guide you through this shaping method so that you won t get stuck while working the neck bend in fur **what you ll get** 36-page pattern with written instructions and 190+ pictures detailed supplies list including yarn quantities tools skills and any other supplies free bonus booklet projectarian s pro tips for amigurumi free access to forum-style support ** here 4 ** supplementary fur-crocheting video ** here 5 ** **pattern info** **skill level ** beginner i ve written this pattern with you in mind and gone to great lengths to make it accessible to those with beginner skills the pattern has been thoroughly tested to ensure it s accurate and easy to follow if you get stuck see the help resources and links above i have a video on the fur crocheting technique so visit **my youtube channel** for that - instant download - pdf only digital files not a physical book - english only
